message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted. It offers exceptional value and functionality that exceeds expectations. Given its quality and features, we believe it's worth more than $150. However, to make this opportunity more appealing, I am offering it to you for $120. This is an exclusive offer tailored for someone with discerning taste like yourself. Don't miss out on this chance to own a piece that will not only serve its purpose but also add value to your collection. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.
